changelog.change: Reverted back to using LiveSplit Update instead of a separate compute thread, as thread safety with other plugins/LiveSplit itself can't be guaranteed.
Fixed AutoSplitter breaking when Splits are changed/reordered. Added a delay when manually splitting in AutoSplitter-mode to prevent double-splits.
Improved detection by a bit, added option to disable AutoSplitter on skip until manual split, made AutoSplitter more resistant to wrong detections.
Improved detection by a bit, fixed AutoSplitter bugs, fixed LiveSplit auto-update!
Improved detection by a bit, added saving settings, added AutoSplitter. Make sure to always "Save Layout" so your AutoSplitter settings get saved!

Modified the detection algorithm to not OR all the feature vector bins, but to match at least 1 full vector. The default value for "Matching" might be a little low - if it's detecting regular gameplay as loads, you might need to put it a little higher.
Added more data for streched aspect ratio + aku during loading.
Added ability to change required matches for pause. Added button for update preview / create diagnostics.
Added ability to select custom scale for Windows DPI Scaling issues. This will allow you to change the capture scale if you have scaling enabled on Windows.
More bugfixes, support mouse drag in preview.
Fixed tons of bugs, added region selection/cropping to preview in settings.
